long_description: Organize, connect and keep your keys and small valuables secure with the #2 size stainless-steel Nite Ize S-Biner SlideLock Keychain. Its two innovative plastic sliders keep the gates securely closed. S-Biner SlideLock stays firmly locked until you choose to open it, allowing for simple and secure linking, attaching and carrying. Each gate can be independently locked for convenient access.
short_description: Organize, connect and keep your keys and small valuables secure with the #2 size stainless-steel Nite Ize S-Biner SlideLock Keychain. Its two innovative plastic sliders keep the gates securely closed.
